00036 lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::DataReader_ImageNet(int batchSize, bool shuffle)
00037   : DataReader(batchSize, shuffle)
00038 {
00039   m_image_width = 256;
00040   m_image_height = 256;
00041   m_num_labels = 1000;
00042 
00043   m_pixels = new unsigned char[m_image_width * m_image_height * 3];
00044 }
00045 
00046 lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::DataReader_ImageNet(int batchSize)
00047   : DataReader_ImageNet(batchSize, true) {}
00048 
00049 lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::DataReader_ImageNet(const DataReader_ImageNet& source)
00050   : DataReader((const DataReader&) source),
00051     m_image_dir(source.m_image_dir), ImageList(source.ImageList),
00052     m_image_width(source.m_image_width), m_image_height(source.m_image_height), m_num_labels(source.m_num_labels)
00053 {
00054   m_pixels = new unsigned char[m_image_width * m_image_height * 3];
00055   memcpy(this->m_pixels, source.m_pixels, m_image_width * m_image_height * 3);
00056 }
00057 
00058 lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::~DataReader_ImageNet()
00059 {
00060   delete m_pixels;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::fetch_data(Mat& X)
00064 {
00065   if(!DataReader::position_valid()) {
00066     return 0;
00067   }
00068         
00069         int pixelcount = m_image_width * m_image_height;
00070   int current_batch_size = getBatchSize();
00071         
00072   int n = 0;
00073   for (n = CurrentPos; n < CurrentPos + current_batch_size; n++) {
00074     if (n >= (int)ShuffledIndices.size())
00075       break;
00076                         
00077     int k = n - CurrentPos;
00078     int index = ShuffledIndices[n];
00079     string imagepath = m_image_dir + ImageList[index].first;
00080 
00081     int width, height;
00082     bool ret = lbann::image_utils::loadJPG(imagepath.c_str(), width, height, true, m_pixels);
00083     if(!ret) {
00084       throw lbann_exception("ImageNet: image_utils::loadJPG fauled to load");
00085     }
00086     if(width != m_image_width || height != m_image_height) {
00087       throw lbann_exception("ImageNet: mismatch data size -- either width or height");
00088     }
00089                         
00090     for (int p = 0; p < pixelcount; p++) {
00091       X.Set(p, k, m_pixels[p] / 255.0f);
00092     }
00093   }
00094 
00095         return (n - CurrentPos);
00096 }
00097 
00098 int lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::fetch_label(Mat& Y)
00099 {
00100   if(!position_valid()) {
00101     return 0;
00102   }
00103 
00104   int current_batch_size = getBatchSize();
00105   int n = 0;
00106   for (n = CurrentPos; n < CurrentPos + current_batch_size; n++) {
00107     if (n >= (int)ShuffledIndices.size())
00108       break;
00109                         
00110     int k = n - CurrentPos;
00111     int index = ShuffledIndices[n];
00112     int label = ImageList[index].second;
00113 
00114     Y.Set(label, k, 1);
00115   }
00116         return (n - CurrentPos);
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::load(string imageDir, string imageListFile)
00120 {
00121         m_image_dir = imageDir; 
00122         ImageList.clear();
00123 
00124         // load image list
00125         FILE* fplist = fopen(imageListFile.c_str(), "rt");
00126         if (!fplist)
00127                 return false;
00128         while (!feof(fplist)) {
00129                 char imagepath[512];
00130                 int imagelabel;
00131                 if (fscanf(fplist, "%s%d", imagepath, &imagelabel) <= 1)
00132                         break;
00133                 ImageList.push_back(make_pair(imagepath, imagelabel));
00134         }
00135         fclose(fplist);
00136         
00137         // reset indices
00138         ShuffledIndices.clear();
00139         ShuffledIndices.resize(ImageList.size());
00140         for (size_t n = 0; n < ImageList.size(); n++) {
00141                 ShuffledIndices[n] = n;
00142         }
00143 
00144         return true;
00145 }
00146 
00147 bool lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::load(string imageDir, string imageListFile, size_t max_sample_count, bool firstN) {
00148   bool load_successful = false;
00149 
00150   load_successful = load(imageDir, imageListFile);
00151 
00152   if(max_sample_count > getNumData() || ((long) max_sample_count) < 0) {
00153     throw lbann_exception("ImageNet: data reader load error: invalid number of samples selected");
00154   }
00155   select_subset_of_data(max_sample_count, firstN);
00156 
00157   return load_successful;
00158 }
00159 
00160 bool lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::load(string imageDir, string imageListFile, double use_percentage, bool firstN) {
00161   bool load_successful = false;
00162 
00163   load_successful = load(imageDir, imageListFile);
00164 
00165   size_t max_sample_count = rint(getNumData()*use_percentage);
00166 
00167   if(max_sample_count > getNumData() || ((long) max_sample_count) < 0) {
00168     throw lbann_exception("ImageNet: data reader load error: invalid number of samples selected");
00169   }
00170   select_subset_of_data(max_sample_count, firstN);
00171 
00172   return load_successful;
00173 }
00174 
00175 void lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::free()
00176 {
00177   delete m_pixels;
00178 }
00179 
00180 // Assignment operator
00181 lbann::DataReader_ImageNet& lbann::DataReader_ImageNet::operator=(const DataReader_ImageNet& source)
00182 {
00183   // check for self-assignment
00184   if (this == &source)
00185     return *this;
00186 
00187   // Call the parent operator= function
00188   DataReader::operator=(source);
00189 
00190   // first we need to deallocate any data that this data reader is holding!
00191   delete m_pixels;
00192 
00193   this->m_image_dir = source.m_image_dir;
00194   this->ImageList = source.ImageList;
00195   this->m_image_width = source.m_image_width;
00196   this->m_image_height = source.m_image_height;
00197   this->m_num_labels = source.m_num_labels;
00198 
00199   m_pixels = new unsigned char[m_image_width * m_image_height * 3];
00200   memcpy(this->m_pixels, source.m_pixels, m_image_width * m_image_height * 3);
00201 
00202   return *this;
00203 }
